CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(pi__grade__c = "D-", "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "D", "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "D+", "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "C-", "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "C", "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "C+", "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "B-", "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "B", "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "B+", "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "A-", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "A", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", IF(pi__grade__c = "A+", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" )))))))))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Grade Rating
